propositions.original_proposition: Westminster and Camden have the highest concentration of licensed restaurants, accounting for 30% of the total in London.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Westminster and Camden stand out with a notably high concentration of licensed restaurants, making up a significant portion of London's total.
propositions.chart_title: Concentration of Licensed Restaurants by Borough
propositions.chart_description: Visual comparison of restaurant concentrations across London boroughs.

propositions.original_proposition: Outer London boroughs have 20% fewer restaurants per capita compared to inner London boroughs.
